item.title: __TODO__ What Is __init__.py Anyway?
item.description: The details of what that pesky __init__.py file is actually doing in all of the Python modules out there.

item.title: __TODO__ Memoization in Python
item.description: Memoization is a useful tool to speed up programs that are either recursive or simply repetitive in nature. This post is an introduction in how to use this technique (through decorators) in Python.
